[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Gesamtergebnis with a value of 33,516,000 is not equal to the combined total of Gewinn (Verlust) and Sonstiges Ergebnis ( 45,644,000 + 12,128,000 ) with a value of 57,772,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2020-05-01 to 2021-04-30 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Gesamtergebnis : -3 Decimals of Gewinn (Verlust) : -3 Decimals of Sonstiges Ergebnis : -3
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IIODYNYAZ2ID26/2021-04-30/ESEF/AT/0/zumtobel-2021-04-30.zip/zumtobel-2021-04-30/reports/zumtobel-2021-04-30.xhtml 7130

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 04 - Kapitalflussrechnung but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 03 - Bilanz but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialAssets, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentReceivables, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:CurrentTradeReceivables, ifrs-full:Goodwill All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Gewinn (Verlust) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. zumtobel:CostOfSalesThereofSpecialEffects, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, zumtobel:OtherIncomeThereofSpecialEffects, zumtobel:OtherExpenseByFunctionThereofSpecialEffects All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,680,000 reported in the network role http://z.lighting/de/group/investor-relations/finanzinformationen/roles/Gesamtergebnisrechnung should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 16,808,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://z.lighting/de/group/investor-relations/finanzinformationen/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-05-01 to 2020-04-30 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IIODYNYAZ2ID26/2021-04-30/ESEF/AT/0/zumtobel-2021-04-30.zip/zumtobel-2021-04-30/reports/zumtobel-2021-04-30.xhtml 7040

[DQR.IFRS.0138.9841] The filing does not report the element StatementOfCashFlowsAbstract in any presentation linkroles. According to ESMA filing rules this abstract item must be reported as the root element of a Statement Of Cash Flows appearing in the filing.
Rule Element Id:9841 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -
